file_content.text: Look, I'd love nothing more than to see that no-good scum taken down a peg, but there's no way I'm talking.
What's the problem?
Any idea what happens to snitches around here? Don't know about you, but I kinda like not being dead.
What sort of life is that, when you never stand up for your own convictions?
Follow your conscience.
None of that matters. You will give me the information I seek.
[Force Persuade] Talk.
You obviously want to help--so help.
Come on....
And what do you think I'll do to you if you don't squeal?
Then speak. [Threaten him]
None of that matters. I'll give you the information you seek....
Not much of one, I guess.
So it's gonna be like that, huh? Why am I not surprised?
Would you get off my back already? Wow, do I hate this life. Shoulda been a speeder vendor.
I'm about to start talking, but let's be clear--none of this came from me....
What sort of life is that, when you never stand up for your own convictions?
Follow your conscience.
And what do you think I'll do to you if you don't squeal?
Then speak. [Threaten him]
Alright, point taken. I'll tell you what you wanna know....
Ma wanted me to be a geologist. Why I never listened....
